title: Work in Siemens
description: At Siemens, work is more than a job—it’s a chance to shape the future. As a global leader in technology and engineering, Siemens offers a dynamic environment where cutting-edge ideas come to life. Whether you're contributing to smart infrastructure, sustainable energy, or digital transformation, every project is an opportunity to make a real-world impact.

title: Startup in Berlin
description: Berlin’s startup scene is a playground for bold ideas and fast-paced growth. At the heart of Europe’s tech and creative capital, working at a startup here means being part of a culture that thrives on experimentation, agility, and impact. Whether you're building products from scratch, scaling operations, or crafting brand stories, every day brings fresh challenges and real ownership.
